Title: October 2018
Content: 18*p55443a01824* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area19 (a) a student sets up the circuit shown with three identical lamps and a switch.acb  each lamp is marked 1.5 v and two 1.5 v cells of negligible internal resistance are used as a power supply.  the two lamps labelled a and b light with normal brightness when the switch is open.  explain what will happen to the brightness of each lamp when the switch is closed.(6)
